demos.original:
विदारीपञ्चाङ्गुलवृश्चिकालीवृश्चीवदेवाह्वयशूर्पपर्ण्यः
कण्डूकरी जीवनाह्वस्वसंज्ञे द्वे पञ्चके गोपसुता त्रिपादी
demos.rationale: produce the English translation of this Sanskrit passage. We will identify each word and its meaning, then form phrases, and finally construct a coherent sentence.
demos.english: The five-fingered Vishchika fish with a long tail resembling the Vrishchika (Scorpio) sign, Devaahvaya, Shoopa, Parnya, Kandookari, Jivanahvasva, and Tripaadi are the two sons of Gopasuta.

demos.rationale: produce the English translation. We'll start by breaking down the Sanskrit text into individual parts, and then we'll translate each part into English while considering the overall context and meaning of the sentence.
demos.english: The Shalishekhara bearing Alibhartri, Apis, Bhugandhovratalitpai, Pasasana, and others are edible.

demos.original: शिक्षा कल्पो व्याकरणं निरुक्तं ज्योतिषां गतिः छन्दो ऽभिधानं मीमांसा धर्मशास्त्रं पुराणकम्
demos.rationale: produce the English translation: This passage explains various aspects of learning. "Shiksha" refers to teaching or instruction. "Kalpa" means a collection or compilation. "Vyakaranam" is grammar. "Nirukta" signifies explanation or elucidation. "Jyotisham" refers to astronomy. "Chanda" denotes meter or melody in poetry. "Abhidhana" is synonymous with lexicon or dictionary. "Mimansa" is a philosophical system dealing with the interpretation of Vedic texts. "Dharma Shastra" are religious and legal codes. "Puranam" signifies ancient texts.
demos.english: This passage explains various aspects of learning. Shiksha refers to teaching or instruction. Kalpa means a collection or compilation. Vyakaranam is grammar. Nirukta signifies explanation or elucidation. Jyotisham refers to astronomy. Chanda denotes meter or melody in poetry. Abhidhana is synonymous with

demos.original:
व्युत्पत्तिरहिताः शब्दा रूढा आखण्डलादयः
योगो ऽन्वयः स तु गुणक्रियासंबन्धसंभवः
demos.english: Words devoid of origin are considered as basic and unsplit. The connected relationship between quality, action, and substance is known as yoga.

demos.original: धर्माणां प्रविचयमन्तरेण नास्ति क्लेशानां यत उपशान्तयेऽभ्युपायः क्लेशैश्च भ्रमति भवार्णवेऽत्र लोकस्तद्धेतोरत उदितः किलैष शास्त्रा
demos.english: There is no other way to alleviate the sufferings of beings than through the realization of the true nature of dharma. In this ocean of existence, beings are bewildered by their sufferings. The scriptures proclaim that the ultimate solution lies in the understanding of dharma.
